name: simple-screenshot
description: `Simple-ForeignObject` [https://github.com/newbieYoung/Simple-ForeignObject](https://github.com/newbieYoung/Simple-ForeignObject) 是基于 SVG ForeignObject 的网页截图组件，部分实现参考了 `dom-to-image` [https://github.com/tsayen/dom-to-image](https://github.com/tsayen/dom-to-image)；
